benefits.main_title: Code For Life is a non profit initiative that delivers free, open-source games that help all students learn computing.

first.title: 13%
first.text: of university computer science graduates in the UK are women*. We want both boys and girls to feel inspired and confident about technology from a young age.

second.title: 100,000
second.text: Registered users across the world, and growing everyday.

third.title: 2014
third.text: The year that computing was added to the UK curriculum. We’ve been supporting teachers and students ever since.
